amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to implement certain procedures relating to the public-private competition for Federal jobs and services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds made available in the Act from being used to implement the revision of Office of Management and Budget Circular A-76 made on May 29, 2003.

action.text: Amendment (A046) offered by Mr. Van Hollen.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Van Hollen amendment (A046) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 203 (Roll no. 357).
